actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Committee on Judiciary. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.
Committee on Judiciary. Reported to Senate by Senator Biden without amendment. Without written report.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 389.
Indefinitely postponed by Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate passed companion measure H.J.RES. 393 in lieu of this measure by Voice Vote.

official_title: A joint resolution to grant the consent of Congress to the boundary change compact between South Dakota and Nebraska.

summary.text: Interstate Compact - Grants congressional approval to the South Dakota-Nebraska Boundary Compact, which establishes a permanent identifiable compromise boundary line between Dakota County, Nebraska, and Union County, South Dakota, fixed at the centerline of the main channel of the Missouri River established by the United States Corps of Engineers. Provides for the readjustment of such boundary through negotiations if the Missouri River's flow at any point along the course forming the boundary between the States occurs entirely within one of the States.

titles.title: A joint resolution to grant the consent of Congress to the boundary change compact between South Dakota and Nebraska.
